body_html:
Do we have a similar thing for python tests? If not, we should probably
make one.

On Thu, Feb 4, 2016 at 2:05 PM Vijay Vasudevan notifications@github.com
wrote:

honestly, the easiest way is just to put

#if GOOGLE_CUDA

around the test suite. I can do this later today.

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#965 (comment)
.
